Kartavya is a Non-Governmental Organisation providing free and high quality education to underprivileged children living in slums and villages near college campuses. 
 
 Vision 
 
 Kartavya is envisioned to uplift the marginalised citizenry living in slum/village 
 
 Mission 
 
 Kartavya has a mission to establish kartavya model in prominent colleges and varsities across the country.
